directions: Mix quinoa, mustard, egg, garlic, and black pepper together in a bowl; add enough chickpea flour to hold mixture together to form 2 patties.

Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat; cook patties in the hot oil until browned and cooked through, about 4 minutes per side. Add a Swiss cheese slice to each patty and warm until cheese melts, 2 to 3 minutes.
ingredients: 1/2 cup chickpea (garbanzo bean) flour, or as needed
2 teaspoons vegetable oil, or as needed
title: Quinoa Dijon and Swiss Burger
